snippet: Today in an effort to support fashion and technology entrepreneurs Mayor Bloomberg announced the winners of Project Pop-UP N.Y.C., a competition that the Mayor's office and the Economic Development Corporation.

headline.main: Mayor Bloomberg Announces Winners of Project Pop-Up N.Y.C.
